meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the mesoglea.
meanings.sent1: The mesogleal layer provides support to the jellyfish.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the mesogleal structure of the sea creature.
meanings.sent3: The mesogleal consistency of the jellyfish made it wobble amusingly.
meanings.sent4: Her calm demeanor was like the mesogleal stability of the jellyfish in the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The transparent mesogleal nature of the jellyfish allowed it to blend with the water.

meanings.definition: Located in or pertaining to the mesoglea.
meanings.sent1: The mesogleal cells were found deep within the jellyfish.
meanings.sent2: Researchers discovered unique organisms living in the mesogleal environment.
meanings.sent3: The mesogleal area was so cozy that even the tiny fish wanted to move in.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like lost ships wandering in the vast mesogleal expanse.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious glow emanating from the mesogleal depths intrigued the divers.
